text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: In the race called the greatest turf race in the world, the world's most preeminent Uma Musume have gathered.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Will the one to stand at the top be Japan's hero, El Condor Pasa or――

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Will it be France's strongest Uma Musume, Montjeu！？

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The [Prix de l'Arc de Triomphe], starts―― Now!!
